{{Description|Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.}}
'''Exile's Feather''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[The Exile]].

==Description==
Through plains and forests, the exile traveled alone in the wild.<br />Through thick layers of dark clouds, an azure feather fell on his shoulder.<br />The feather came from a panicked bird escaping from the falcon, just like the exile.<br />The feather represents the spirit of a nestless, free bird, just like the exile.
